explains: n. 复调；对位法；旋律配合；对应物
v. 用......作对比；与......形成对比

sentences.en: The two melodies are played in counterpoint.
sentences.cn: 用对位法来演奏这两首曲调。

sentences.en: This work is in austere counterpoint to that of Gaudi.
sentences.cn: 这件作品的质朴风格与高迪的形成了有趣的对比。

sentences.en: Paris is just a short train journey away, providing the perfect counterpoint to the peace and quiet of Reims.
sentences.cn: 从这儿乘火车去巴黎路程很短，那里与兰斯的平和宁静相比简直是另一番景象。
